course.title: ADM 3349 Auditing Theory (3 units)
course.desc: Definition of auditing. Concepts of management assertions, audit objectives, evidence, materiality and risk, internal control, audit planning, and reporting as applied to financial statements. Professional ethics, legal liability, and the responsibilities of auditors to society are also addressed.Course Component: LecturePrerequisite or Corequisite: ADM 3340.
